data.text: @moveleftpod @tab_master @greg_travis Does communism include not being able to make your own medical decisions?
@addictsporadic @greg_travis No, I mean that most drugs are not approved for use in kids, especially under age 12.

@ElaineVigneault @greg_travis People would if not for the medical industrial complex forcing new $$ to market remedies. There is a war on repurposed drugs right now. Because there is very little profit margin in 60-70 yrs drugs. We are dealing w/ drug dealers (big pharma) & the mafia (governments) 👁👁
@greg_travis What are the long term effects of these biotechnologies being used in humans? How did animal trials go?

@greg_travis I’d be interested in seeing study. NO data in the US was classifying dying WITH c19 vs FROM c19 until 2022. Have y’all looked at vaccine adverse affects? Anyone tracking all cause mortality after vaccines? Why is no one here talking relative vs absolute risk of vax?
@greg_travis I am deeply concerned about the global governmental neglect of children in general and at-risk children in particular. There is a policy to infect them, not to care for and protect them.
@greg_travis I also had to conduct my own research, as the mother of a high-risk covid baby girl, who has not yet reached the vaccination age of three years in Argentina, with Sinopharm.

@greg_travis In Argentina it is similar, and reports from the Ministry of Health hardly matter any more. According to official figures, 329 children have died since the beginning of the pandemic. BUT deaths between the ages of 0 to two years are 111 children, of which 72 died between 2021- 22

@onyx_coltrane @ToshiAkima Also the AAP data is based on a slightly smaller survey than the Data Tracker and even NVSS data so it will show lower absolute #s, just because it isn't capturing all deaths

@onyx_coltrane @ToshiAkima Reporting lag.  The other two will follow.  See how the three are in sync up to around November and then diverge

The NVSS data in particular is about 2-3 months behind
